topics.title: Describe a Fun Outdoor Activity
topics.prompt: Describe a fun outdoor activity you enjoyed recently.
topics.hint: 說出你做了什麼活動，在哪裡，為什麼覺得有趣，3-5 句話。
topics.sample: Last weekend, I went to the park with my friends. We played on the slides and had a picnic. The weather was nice, and I really enjoyed the fresh air.

topics.title: Talk About Using a Hair Dryer
topics.prompt: Explain how you use a hair dryer and why it is useful.
topics.hint: 描述你使用吹風機的經驗，說明用途和感受，3-4 句。
topics.sample: I use a hair dryer after I wash my hair. It helps me dry my hair quickly, especially when it is cold outside. I like that it is fast and easy to use.

topics.title: Describe Melting Ice
topics.prompt: Talk about what happens when you melt ice and where you have seen this before.
topics.hint: 解釋冰是如何融化的，並分享你見過融冰的經驗，3-5 句。
topics.sample: When ice melts, it turns into water. I saw ice melting in my glass on a warm day. It was interesting to watch the ice change its shape.

topics.title: Share a Time You Took Photos
topics.prompt: Describe a time when you took pictures with your friends or family.
topics.hint: 說明拍照的時間、地點和感受，3-5 句。
topics.sample: Last summer, I went to the beach with my family. We took many pictures by the sea. It was fun to remember those moments later.

topics.title: Express Your Feelings About Sliding
topics.prompt: Talk about how you feel when you slide down a slide.
topics.hint: 描述滑滑梯時的感受和喜好，3-4 句。
topics.sample: I love sliding down slides because it feels exciting. Sometimes it makes me laugh and feel happy. I enjoy playing in the playground.

topics.title: Describe a Time You Could Not Stop Laughing
topics.prompt: Share a story when you couldn't stop laughing and why.
topics.hint: 講一個你笑個不停的經驗，說明原因和場景，3-5 句。
topics.sample: Once, my friend told a funny joke during class. I started laughing and couldn't stop. It was hard to pay attention, but it was very funny.

topics.title: Talk About Taking Care of Things
topics.prompt: Explain why it is important to be careful with things that can break.
topics.hint: 說明為什麼要愛惜物品，避免損壞，並分享你的看法，3-4 句。
topics.sample: It is important to be careful because some things can break easily. When we take care of our stuff, they last longer. It also helps us save money.

topics.title: Describe a Goodbye Moment
topics.prompt: Talk about a time when you said goodbye to someone and how you felt.
topics.hint: 描述告別的時間、對象和感受，3-5 句。
topics.sample: Last week, I said goodbye to my cousin who visited from another city. I felt a little sad but happy to see her again next time.

topics.title: Explain How to Take a Good Picture
topics.prompt: Give tips on how to take a good picture with friends.
topics.hint: 分享拍照的小技巧，說明如何讓照片更好看，3-5 句。
topics.sample: To take a good picture, make sure everyone is smiling and looking at the camera. Good lighting is also important. Holding the camera steady helps.

topics.title: Describe Your Favorite Playground Game
topics.prompt: Talk about your favorite game to play at the playground and why.
topics.hint: 說明最喜歡的遊戲內容和原因，3-4 句。
topics.sample: My favorite playground game is hide and seek. It is fun to find good hiding spots and surprise my friends. It makes me feel excited.
